to make something happen, especially a change or an improved situation
PersianDef: موجب شدن (یک اتفاق یا شرایط بهتر)

EnglishDef: used when an event, action etc makes a feeling or problem start to exist
PersianDef: باعث شدن (یک احساس یا یک مشکل)

EnglishDef: to make something suddenly start to happen, especially a bad situation such as a crisis or a war, or a medical condition
PersianDef: باعث سریع اتفاقی شدن (خصوصاً یک شرایط بد)

EnglishDef: to happen because of something else that happened or was done. He said the success of his company was the result of hard work by all the staff.
if a problem or a serious situation arises from something, it starts to happen because of it.
PersianDef: نتیجه شدن از (در مورد یک مشکل)

EnglishDef: if something stems from another thing, it develops from it and there is a direct link with it, even though this link is not always immediately obvious.
if something plays a part, it is one of several things that causes something to happen
to be one of several things that affect something
if something contributes to a situation, it is one of the things that cause that situation to happen or become worse, but it is not one of the main causes
PersianDef: باعث شدن (یکی از عوامل چیزی بودن)

EnglishDef: if something influences another thing, it has an effect on it, although it does not cause it directly
something that causes something else to develop, for example a disagreement, a feeling, or an infection
the original and most important cause of something, especially a problem
because
to happen after or as a result of something
to make someone decide to do something
because of something else, especially a problem or difficulty
because of something
in order to do something

Vocabulary: With the aim of doing something
EnglishDef: with the hope to achieve something
for the purpose of doing something
the reason that makes someone do something, especially when this reason is kept hidden
because of something
something that happens as a result of a particular action or set of conditions
because of someone or something good
